name: Balloon Invaders
description:
Balloon Invaders --  “A Beta Game for Alpha Males”

Defend your country in this harrowing action adventure fever dream of a game. We hope you like our game because we sure did put in a full 7 hours of work into creating the first iteration. Shoot the balloons and other invaders as they fall from the sky. Don’t catch Covid or let the invaders touch the ground or you will lose all your points.  Use the left and right arrow keys to move the flag, and space to fire!

Scoring:
+8 Points per Balloon
+19 Points per Covid that falls to the ground without hitting you.

Keep on the lookout for future updates and releases!

Coming soon, “Russian Invaders 2023” Expansion!
